meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joe Holtzmann Karen Kratzer Scott Troy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4422.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Joe Holtzmann, a teacher from Wahiawa, Hawaii
Karen Kratzer, a tax accountant from Annapolis, Maryland
Scott Troy, a student from Highland Park, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $15,600)

tr.td: WE "LOVE" LITERATURE
THE BOYS IN THE BAND
POTPOURRI
& IN THIS CORNER
THE FOOD BIZ
COMIN' UP SHORT
